<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6344) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 203 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=253)

**Prerequisites**
You speak at least 3 languages

</column>

---

You have studied languages and their development. You become trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47); if you were already trained in Society, you instead become an expert in Society. You gain the [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=5181) skill feat twice.

<title level="2">Linguist Dedication leads to...</title>
[Analyze Idiolect](/Feats.aspx?ID=6348), [Crude Communication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6350), [Multilingual Cipher](/Feats.aspx?ID=6345), [Phonetic Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=6346), [Read Shibboleths](/Feats.aspx?ID=6349), [Spot Translate](/Feats.aspx?ID=6347)
name: Linguist Dedication
